subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
The main goal of Lithuanian Local Action groups network- harmonious functioning, open, dynamic structure of local action groups, actively participating in  development process that encourages partnership in Lithuania and abroad. 
Organize and control the process of rural development, to promote entrepreneurship of rural areas, NGO's, small business.  
To implement transnational and international project related with rural development.
